Type.Name: TearDownAttribute
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: This attribute is used inside a TestFixture to provide a function that are performed after a test method is called.

remarks.para: A TestFixture can have only one TearDown method. If more than one is defined the TestFixture will not be run. It will compile however.

Docs.summary: Flags a method as a Cleanup method
